verses.roman:
māyā-śakti rahe kāraṇābdhira bāhire
kāraṇa-samudra māyā paraśite nāre

synonyms: māyā-śakti—material energy; rahe—remains; kāraṇa-abdhira—to the Causal Ocean; bāhire—external; kāraṇa-samudra—the Causal Ocean; māyā—material energy; paraśite nāre—cannot touch.
translation: Māyā-śakti resides outside the Causal Ocean. Māyā cannot touch its waters.
